data: It was very early in the morning, it was scarcely dawn, when the young man started upon a walk of twenty-five miles to reach Alton, where he was to be assistant to the one physician in the place, Doctor Thomas Gordon, or as he was familiarly called, “Doc.” Gordon.
early in the morning | scarcely dawn

It was very early in the morning, it was scarcely dawn, when the young man started upon a walk of twenty-five miles to reach Alton, where he was to be assistant to the one physician in the place, Doctor Thomas Gordon, or as he was familiarly called, "Doc." Gordon.
Freeman, Mary Eleanor Wilkins, 1852-1930; Merrill, Frank T., 1848-1923 [Illustrator]
